about_the_game:
BabushCats is a pixel-art, top-down simulation game with elements of combat and progression. Take on the role of a wholesome grandma who runs a shelter, caring for stray cats. Customise your home as the number of your lovely pets grows. At night, prepare to battle your cats' nightmares and stop them from disturbing their sleep! Defeat mysterious nightmare bosses and find your ultimate cat companionship.

Features:

  • Take care of stray cats! Feed them their favourite food, wash them carefully and watch their trust level rise. Each need comes with its unique interaction.

  • Upgrade your house! Unlock new rooms with special appliances as cats get more demanding over time.

  • Fight hundreds of nightmares! When night falls, Babushka has to face her cats' nightmares to help them sleep peacefully.

  • Discover special cat abilities! Each cat comes with their set of abilities that can be unlocked by earning their trust and are later used when facing nightmares.

  • Create your own arsenal! Try unusual combinations of skills and weapons, match them to your playstyle. Water guns or maybe a yarn launcher?

  • Defeat 5 monstrous bosses! Face cats' biggest fears, such as Circus Ringmaster or Cat Hybrids.
